name: XMLGenerator
input: Generate an abnormally formatted sample xml file describing Layer 2 Network elements. Return just the xml. No other extra text- The input is : Fruit Description Fruit A red, large, apple. Price: $3.00/lb. Link to buy: https://usapple.org/
output:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<NetworkLayer2>
    <Element id="fruit-001">
        <Name>Fruit</Name>
        <Properties>
            <Description>Fruit A red, large, apple.</Description>
            <Price currency="USD">
                <Amount>3.00</Amount>
                <Unit>lb</Unit>
            </Price>
            <Links>
                <PurchaseURL
                    protocol="https"
                    domain="usapple.org"
                    >https://usapple.org/</PurchaseURL>
            </Links>
        </Properties>
        <NetworkAttributes>
            <VLANTag>100</VLANTag>
            <MacAddress>00:11:22:33:44:55</MacAddress>
            <FrameSize>1500</FrameSize>
            <QoSPriority>3</QoSPriority>
        </NetworkAttributes>
        <Metadata>
            <CreatedDate>2023-05-20T10:30:00Z</CreatedDate>
            <LastModified>2023-05-20T10:30:00Z</LastModified>
            <Version>1.0.0</Version>
            </Metadata>
    </Element>
</NetworkLayer2>

name: XML Formatter
input:
Take this abnormally formatted xml file and pretty print it. The pretty printed file should have proper indentation and should be easy to read.Return just the xml. No other extra text---[95m<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<NetworkLayer2>
    <Element id="fruit-001">
        <Name>Fruit</Name>
        <Properties>
            <Description>Fruit A red, large, apple.</Description>
            <Price currency="USD">
                <Amount>3.00</Amount>
                <Unit>lb</Unit>
            </Price>
            <Links>
                <PurchaseURL
                    protocol="https"
                    domain="usapple.org"

            </Links>
        </Properties>
        <NetworkAttributes>
            <VLANTag>100</VLANTag>
            <MacAddress>00:11:22:33:44:55</MacAddress>
            <FrameSize>1500</FrameSize>
            <QoSPriority>3</QoSPriority>
        </NetworkAttributes>
        <Metadata>
            <CreatedDate>2023-05-20T10:30:00Z</CreatedDate>
            <LastModified>2023-05-20T10:30:00Z</LastModified>
            <Version>1.0.0</Version>
            </Metadata>
    </Element>
</NetworkLayer2>[00m---
